article:
The technology is improving every year. We will see some very exciting home robots in the next few years. In the future the robots can do lots of things.
1. Getting things
In a few years, it will be possible to tell your home robot to get a piece of bread for you.
The robot will use its eyes and an arm to get the bread for you.
2. Watering plants
Future robots will carry water to water plants.
3. Telling dangers 
A home robot will find out fire, smoke and other dangers easily. Every night the robot will make its rounds to make sure that everything is right.
4. Looking after children
A robot will help us look after our children well while we are not at home.
